word_mean: 果糖：化学名，D-果糖。一种己酮糖，分子式为C6H12O6，存在于蜂蜜和许多甜水果中，并且是许多双糖和多糖的成分。通过蔗糖水溶液的转化，再将果糖和葡萄糖分开而获得。法定制剂〔USP〕通常是无色结晶，或是一种白色结晶性粉末，用作静脉注射用液体或营养添加剂

sentence.Network_en: Burley found labeled glucose and fructose in equimolar amounts.
sentence.Network_cn: 波里发现等克分子量的示踪葡萄糖和果糖.

sentence.Network_en: Sucrose is sweet than glucose but not as sweet as fructose.
sentence.Network_cn: 蔗糖比葡萄糖甜,但没有果糖甜.

sentence.Network_en: Fructose is one of the most essential high - grade carbohydrates.
sentence.Network_cn: 果糖是大多数的人体必需的基本高级碳水化合物之一.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 精浆果糖(Fructose)是WHO推荐的精囊分泌功能评价指标。精囊分泌的果糖是精子能量的主要来源。

entry.def: Fructose is a sweet substance which occurs naturally in fruit and vegetables. It is sometimes used to make food sweeter.

means.word_mean: 1. a simple sugar found in honey and in many ripe fruits
